attributes.action: Reduce the V.A.T on ALL goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the cost of fuel is rising at an extortionate rate the cost of all goods sold in Great Britain is rising therefore the government is reaping in extra V.A.T - The government should Immediately reduce the V.A.T on ALL goods to below 15% to help reduce the burdon on the already over taxed public of this country
